formalpara.title: Figure 4. GLR-1::GFP is expressed in a punctate pattern along processes of the ventral cord
formalpara.para: A confocal image of a transgenic worm that expressed a functional GLR-1::GFP chimera (Rongo et al., 1998). GLR-1::GFP is expressed in cell bodies (arrow) and in punctate structures in the ventral cord processes (arrowhead) thought to represent postsynaptic sites.
